name: cope - nibbler in an oil spill - neoronal filtering to make sense of maximal coomplexity

shape_1_per_frame2=y=y-0.4*sin(q6);

shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=2.41456
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=0.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=r=q8;
shape_3_per_frame2=g=q7;
shape_3_per_frame3=b=q6;
shape_3_per_frame4=
shape_3_per_frame5=r2=r;
shape_3_per_frame6=g2=g;
shape_3_per_frame7=b2=b;
per_frame_1=//---------- INDECISIVE CODE --------------
per_frame_2=vol = (bass+mid)/6;
per_frame_3=xamptarg = if(equal(frame%15,0),min(0.5*vol*bass_att,0.5),xamptarg);
per_frame_4=xamp = xamp + 0.5*(xamptarg-xamp);
per_frame_5=xdir = if(above(abs(xpos),xamp),-sign(xpos),if(below(abs(xspeed),0.1),2*above(xpos,0)-1,xdir));
per_frame_6=xaccel = xdir*xamp - xpos - xspeed*0.055*below(abs(xpos),xamp);
per_frame_7=xspeed = xspeed + xdir*xamp - xpos - xspeed*0.055*below(abs(xpos),xamp);
per_frame_8=xpos = xpos + 0.001*xspeed;
per_frame_9=yamptarg = if(equal(frame%15,0),min(0.3*vol*treb_att,0.5),yamptarg);
per_frame_10=yamp = yamp + 0.5*(yamptarg-yamp);
per_frame_11=ydir = if(above(abs(ypos),yamp),-sign(ypos),if(below(abs(yspeed),0.1),2*above(ypos,0)-1,ydir));
per_frame_12=yaccel = ydir*yamp - ypos - yspeed*0.055*below(abs(ypos),yamp);
per_frame_13=yspeed = yspeed + ydir*yamp - ypos - yspeed*0.055*below(abs(ypos),yamp);
per_frame_14=ypos = ypos + 0.001*yspeed;
per_frame_15=speed=yspeed+xspeed;
per_frame_16=pos=xpos+ypos;
per_frame_17=cy_range=1;
per_frame_18=cx_range=1;
per_frame_19=cy_i = cy_range*sin(xspeed*ypos+(sin(time*0.964)-0.5*cos(time*0.256)));
per_frame_20=cx_i = cx_range*sin(yspeed*xpos-(cos(time*1.345)-0.5*cos(time*0.331)));
per_frame_21=q4=cx_i;
per_frame_22=q5=cy_i;
per_frame_23=//------------------------------------------
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=//wave_x = wave_x+0.3*sin(cy_i);
per_frame_26=//wave_y = wave_y+0.3*sin(cx_i);
per_frame_27=
per_frame_28=wave_r = wave_r + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.3) + 0.4*sin(0.98*time));
per_frame_29=wave_b = wave_b + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.1) + 0.4*sin(0.78*time));
per_frame_30=wave_g = wave_g + 0.5*(0.6*sin(time*1.2) + 0.4*sin(0.6*time));
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=q8=wave_r;
per_frame_33=q7=wave_b;
per_frame_34=q6=wave_g;
per_frame_35=warp=0;
per_frame_36=vol = 0.1*(vol*9 + (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.333333);
per_frame_37=q1=vol*2;
per_frame_38=q1=1;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=mtime=mtime+vol*0.01;
per_frame_41=q2=mtime*0.25;
per_frame_42=q2=vol*1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float3 rc = lerp(float3(0,0,0), float3(0,1,0), uv.y);
warp_4=`    uv = float2(uv.x, uv.y+0.005*rc.y);
warp_5=`        
warp_6=`
warp_7=`    float3 boxave = (GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_8=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y+texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_9=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x-texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) +
warp_10=`                     GetPixel(float2(uv.x+texsize.z*q2,uv.y-texsize.w*q2)) ) / 4;
warp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv);
warp_12=`    ret = cross(boxave, 1-ret)*1.2;
warp_13=`    
warp_14=`    //ret -= 0.002;
warp_15=`    //ret *= 0.995;
warp_16=`}
comp_1=`// to access a texture on disk: make a sampler.  This example loads "lichen.{tga/jpg/etc}".
comp_2=`sampler2D sampler_fw_lichen;  // _FW = filtering + wrap; _PC = point sampling + edge clamp; etc.
comp_3=`float4    texsize_lichen;     // auto-binds; .xy = (w,h); .zw = (1/w,1/h)
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
comp_6=`shader_body      
comp_7=`
comp_8=`
comp_9=`
comp_10=`{
comp_11=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_12=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, 1-uv));
comp_13=`    ret = ret*1.50-0.2; //old gamma effect
comp_14=`    
comp_15=`}
